songs.title: Crusaids
songs.lyrics:
Destroyers of devilishment
Spiritual development
Astro intelligence
Master of elements
Studies of the Testaments
Doctors of measurement
Mental fulfillment
True wordsmiths, Sunz of Man
Black robes of prophets
Cosmics... rays
Destroyers of devilishment
Spiritual development
Astro intelligence
Master of elements
Studies of the Testaments
Doctors of measurement
Mental fulfillment
True wordsmiths...
